title: What happened to Exhaust!

embed.description: Exhaust is a targeted Summoner spell that affects enemy champions. It reduces their movement speed and attack speed by 30%, their armor and magic resistance by 10, and their damage dealt by 40% for 2.5 seconds. Exhaust is an extremely powerful tool for disabling champions who mainly autoattack, as well as any champion that can deal a high amount of damage.

body: Why was the attack speed reduction and the Magic resist/Armor reduction taken off exhaust?{{summoner:3}} a tower dive by an adc like Vayne{{champion:67}} will destroy any low life tank seeking to survive under a tower.

replies.body: Weil Vayne auch dafür bekannt ist, mal eben so unter deinem Turm zu stehen... Vor allem bei ihrer aktuell nicht ganz so guten pickrate. Das wichtigste (defensive) hat exhaust behalten.

Besonders weil die ganzen ADC´s so strong zurzeit sind (besonders die die auf ATS scalieren^^).

Ich finde den "buff" sehr berechtigt, denn exhaust verringert den verursachte Schaden sowiso, warum wurde der Schaden eines ADC 2mal verringert, der Schaden eines Mages aber nur einmal?
Dude the player has to protect the tower and not the other way (except in first 5 minutes, where vayne alone will not be able to take down the tower after she dived you.) ;)
